targets.query:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "nic")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "${Datacenter}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["node"], set: ${Node:json}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({unique_name: r.node + "_" + r.nic}) )
  |> unique(column: "unique_name")
  |> count(column: "unique_name")

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "nic" and r["_field"] == "state")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "${Datacenter}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["node"], set: ${Node:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] != "up")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({unique_name: r.node + "_" + r.nic}) )
  |> unique(column: "unique_name")
  |> count(column: "unique_name")

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "nic" and r["_field"] == "speed")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "${Datacenter}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["node"], set: ${Node:json}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: int(v: r._value) }) )
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "nic" and r["_field"] == "util_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "${Datacenter}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["node"], set: ${Node:json}))
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "nic" and r["_field"] == "tx_bytes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "${Datacenter}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["node"], set: ${Node:json}))
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "nic" and r["_field"] == "rx_bytes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "${Datacenter}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["node"], set: ${Node:json}))
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "nic")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "${Datacenter}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["_field"], set: ["util_percent", "tx_bytes", "rx_bytes", "speed", "type"]))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["speed"] != "0")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "nic" and  r["_field"] == "tx_bytes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "${Datacenter}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["node"], set: ${Node:json}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with display_name: r.node + " - " + r.nic}) )
  |> group(columns: ["display_name"], mode: "by")
  |> keep(columns: ["display_name", "_value", "_time"])

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "nic" and  r["_field"] == "rx_bytes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "${Datacenter}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["node"], set: ${Node:json}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with display_name: r.node + " - " + r.nic}) )
  |> group(columns: ["display_name"], mode: "by")
  |> keep(columns: ["display_name", "_value", "_time"])

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "nic" and  r["_field"] == "util_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "${Datacenter}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["node"], set: ${Node:json}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with display_name: r.node + " - " + r.nic}) )
  |> group(columns: ["display_name"], mode: "by")
  |> keep(columns: ["display_name", "_value", "_time"])

panels.description: Summarized on Cluster or Node level. Select Eth to show for a specific Ethernet Port.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "nic" and r["_field"] =~ /tx_\w*errors/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "${Datacenter}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["node"], set: ${Node:json}))
  |> group(columns: ["cluster", "_field"], mode: "by")
  |> keep(columns: ["_field", "_value", "_time"])

panels.title: Send Errors

panels.description: Summarized on Cluster or Node level. Select Eth to show for a specific Ethernet Port.

targets.query:

  |> keep(columns: ["_field", "_value", "_time"])

panels.title: Receive Errors

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "fcp")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "${Datacenter}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["node"], set: ${Node:json}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({unique_name: r.node + "_" + r.port}) )
  |> unique(column: "unique_name")
  |> count(column: "unique_name")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["speed"] == "0") 
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({unique_name: r.node + "_" + r.port}) )

  |> count(column: "unique_name")

panels.description:
Summarized on Cluster or Node level. Select FCP to show for a specific FibreChannel Port.

* **int_count**  :  interrupts
* ** isr_count** :  interrupt responses
* **invalid_crc** : invalid Cyclic Redundancy Checks

NetApp has a KB about these metrics:

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "fcp" and contains(value: r["_field"], set: ["int_count", "invalid_transmission_word", "isr_count", "spurious_int_count", "invalid_crc"]))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "${Datacenter}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["node"], set: ${Node:json}))
  |> group(columns: ["_field"], mode: "by")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)

panels.title: Transmission interrupts

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "fcp" and contains(value: r["_field"], set: ["discarded_frames_count", "loss_of_signal", "loss_of_sync", "prim_seq_err", "queue_full", "threshold_full"]))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "${Datacenter}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["node"], set: ${Node:json}))
  |> group(columns: ["_field"], mode: "by")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "fcp" and  r["_field"] == "link_down")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "${Datacenter}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["node"], set: ${Node:json}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with display_name: r.node + " - " + r.port}) )
  |> group(columns: ["display_name"], mode: "by")
  |> keep(columns: ["display_name", "_value", "_time"])

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "fcp" and  r["_field"] == "link_failure")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "${Datacenter}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["node"], set: ${Node:json}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with display_name: r.node + " - " + r.port}) )
  |> group(columns: ["display_name"], mode: "by")
  |> keep(columns: ["display_name", "_value", "_time"])

list.definition:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "nic")
  |> keep(columns: ["datacenter"])
  |> group()
  |> distinct(column: "datacenter")
